content: 6 7 to last 3 sts yo k2tog k1 there are 8 underarm buttonholes along row work in garter st for 2 row bind off all sts cuff knit-wise work in garter st in the round purl one round knit one round for 6 rnds bind off all sts loosely purl-wise finishing weave in ends and block to measurements work right sleeve as left sew a button to correspond with each button- hole along button band 4 ©2020 eweknit version 2 april 2020 questions email info@eweknit ca www eweknit ca ~ instagram eweknitto share finished projects by hashtagging #eweknitprojects
